GSD.product_version: versions from v4.7 to before v5.15.70
GSD.description:
of: fdt: fix off-by-one error in unflatten_dt_nodes()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.70 by commit ba6b9f7cc1108bad6e2c53b1d6e0156379188db7, it was introduced in version v4.7 by commit 78c44d910d3e5f96dc6b3695fc1e4efd7c46a455. For more details please see the references link.
